name: framingham-app-final
description: This is a final version of the Framingham Risk Calculator in the FHIR Education package. It is SMART-enabled, CDS Hooks-enabled, and has been given a polished front-end. Risk equations come from https://www.mdcalc.com/framingham-risk-score-hard-coronary-heart-disease#evidence. Docker/Node/Hooks server file architecture adapted from https://github.com/cerner/cds-services-tutorial/wiki sources for front-end are included in the README
author: Stratametrics LLC
